divs: Sighting DetailsSubmitted and being investigated by MUFON FI, Jim Strausbaugh It was north of Bellcenter in ohio and south of Kenton ohio. Moving NNE above the tree tops, no sound and no lights just a soft slow movement over the trees Till out of sight, and I watched it for 12 to 18 seconds of flight. It was the size of a bus and it changed my life,, I was standing up hill looking down in the field an seen my dog look at something and i looked as well. My dog seen it first , Think about that for a second and then followed through with the flight as i did till out of sight over the trees, no sound, no lights, And i was the last person on earth to beleave in UFO`s and now I don`t beleave anything that our Government has to say from that day on.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Belle Center
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Observed a bus-sized UFO slowly moving 30ft above ground
